title: AIIMS Jodhpur Jobs 2026 - Apply Online for 03 Nursing Officer, Technician, and DEO Posts
description: The All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Jodhpur (AIIMS Jodhpur) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 03 Nursing Officer, Technician, and Data Entry Operator Jobs. Interested and eligibile candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.Sc Nursing, GNM, Diploma, 12th, or any degree can apply for the AIIMS Jodhpur Jobs 2026. The interested applicants can apply in online mode...
